ing: 8 slices white bread, with crusts trimmed
des: "This is a great Aussie kids party favorite, we were all brought up on it.  Bread is spread with margarine and topped with colored sprinkles, or if you are in Australia, 100's and 1000's. It's a loved recipe."
ins: Spread margarine onto slices of bread. Cover with sprinkles. Cut into triangles to serve.
